S.FORM: == baca' == 洗 baca' sa, mibaca' tu dawa, zikuc, caykaw nu zuma a tuutuud. iayaw mibaca' kita paylima, ayza sa mibaca' kami saungay ku baca'-kikay. baca'en baca'en 去洗/ bace'en ku zikuc ni Kacaw. mabaca' mabaca' 被洗/ mabaca' ni Lala' ku tuper nu maku. mibaca' mibaca' 在洗/ amana ka kasic mibaca' tu zikuc nu mita. mibaca'ay mibaca'ay 在洗的/ u mibaca'ay ku kawaw nu maku i padekuwan. pibaca'i pibacai' 去洗/ pibaca'i tu zikuc nu misu! u sulit nu Amilika Laundry is the washing of clothing and linens. Laundry processes are often done in a room reserved for that purpose; in an individual home this is referred to as a laundry room or utility room. An apartment building or student hall of residence may have a shared laundry facility such as a tvättstuga. A stand-alone business is referred to as a laundrette (laundromat). The material that is being washed, or has been laundered, is also generally referred to as laundry.

== baca' == 洗 baca' sa, mibaca' to dawa, zikoc, caykaw no zoma a tootood. iayaw mibaca' kita paylima, ayza sa mibaca' kami saongay ko baca'-kikay. baca'en baca'en 去洗/ bace'en ko zikoc ni Kacaw. mabaca' mabaca' 被洗/ mabaca' ni Lala' ko toper no mako. mibaca' mibaca' 在洗/ amana ka kasic mibaca' to zikoc no mita. mibaca'ay mibaca'ay 在洗的/ o mibaca'ay ko kawaw no mako i padekowan. pibaca'i pibacai' 去洗/ pibaca'i to zikoc no miso! o solit no Amilika Laondry is the washing of clothing and linens. Laondry processes are often done in a room reserved for that porpose; in an individoal home this is referred to as a laondry room or otility room. An apartment boilding or stodent hall of residence may have a shared laondry facility soch as a tvättstoga. A stand-alone bosiness is referred to as a laondrette (laondromat). The material that is being washed, or has been laondered, is also generally referred to as laondry.
